meanings.definition: A method of etching a printing plate so that tones resembling watercolor washes can be reproduced.
meanings.sent1: The artist used aquatints to create beautiful watercolor-like prints.
meanings.sent2: I bought a lovely aquatint of a seaside scene for my living room.
meanings.sent3: The aquatints in the art gallery made me feel like I was underwater!
meanings.sent4: Her use of aquatints transformed the plain paper into a colorful ocean.
meanings.sent5: The aquatints in the exhibit were so realistic, I almost reached out to touch them.

meanings.definition: A print made using the aquatint method.
meanings.sent1: The aquatints on display at the museum were truly impressive.
meanings.sent2: She purchased a set of aquatints to decorate her office.
meanings.sent3: The aquatints hanging in the cafe added a touch of elegance to the space.
meanings.sent4: The aquatints seemed to capture the essence of a dreamy watercolor painting.
meanings.sent5: I was amazed by the intricate details in the aquatints of the city skyline.
